name: SocialProofOne
description: Social proof section with scrolling marquee displaying company names (default) or logos with optional card styling.

description.example: Join thousands of companies using our platform

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

nameRules.note: Names are displayed as text in an infinite scrolling marquee. Auto-repeated 3x for seamless loop.

logoRules.structure: string[] - Array of logo image paths
logoRules.note: If provided, logos are displayed instead of names. Auto-repeated 3x for seamless loop.

propsSchema.names: string[] (required) - Array of company/partner names to display as text
propsSchema.logos?: string[] - Array of logo image paths. If provided, displays images instead of text names
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.showCard?: boolean (default: true) - Whether to show card styling around items

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <SocialProofOne
    title="Trusted by Industry Leaders"
    description="Join thousands of companies using our platform."
    tag="Partners"
    textboxLayout="default"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    names={[
      "Acme Corp",
      "TechFlow",
      "Innovate Inc",
      "CloudSync"
    ]}
    speed={40}
    showCard={true}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for displaying partner/client names or logos
Include at least 4 items for good visual effect
Use SVG logos for best quality when using images
Use names for a simpler, text-based approach
dont: Do not use with fewer than 4 items
Do not mix very long and very short names
